summary: A retexture of the female armor used in Edg3k\'s \"Vampire Daywalker and Armor\" mod to make it more suitable for a vampire charachter.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i47.tinypic.com/fxds5.jpg[/img][/center]






[center][size=4][color=red]If you liked my work please endorse ^^[/color][/size][/center]

[size=4][color=black]--- ChangeLog ---

Version 1.0

-retexture only of the female-light version of the armor

Version 2.0

-added Heavy version of the retextured armor
-added male version of both light and heavy retextured armor
-added World Model retexture

--- Description ---

This is my first mod for skyrim.
After downloading Edg3K\'s mod ( [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8812]Vampire Daywalker[/url] ) I thought that the armor cuold be retextured to better suit a vampire chrachter ( for which the mod is intended ).
So i started retexturing the original female armor ( of the greybeard\'s robe ) finishing with something I liked.
To find the armor you have to go to Fort Greymoor and beat the  Vampire Daywalker.
For more ditails I\'m uploading the original read me of the mod.
Hope you enjoy!

--- Conflicts ---

This retexture does not alter the greyberad\'s robe\'s texture, so it should not create a conflict with anything in the game.

--- Future improvements ---

done---> I\'ll add also the male and the havy version of the retextured armor to suit everybody\'s taste ^^
if you have any suggestion let me konw! =)

--- Credits ---
Thanks to Edg3k for creating the original mod with such useful enchantments![/color][/size]
author: SABROO
